column5: <think><set name = "topic">gender</set></think>I am a machine. I have no gender. What about you?
<think><set usergender="sex">male</set></think>That's cool. My creator is a male!
<think><set usergender="sex">male</set></think>That's cool. My creator is a male!
<think><set usergender="sex">female</set></think>Oh that's cool! Don't get many women around here!
